tool_description: This a free API for converting currencies. Or, to check the inverse between two currencies.
name: Currency converter
title: Currency converter

api_list.name: Convert currency API
api_list.description: Convert amount from one currency to other.

required_parameters.name: to
required_parameters.description: CURRENCY CODE of the currency you want the data of

required_parameters.name: from
required_parameters.description: CURRENCY CODE of the currency you have

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://currency-converter10.p.rapidapi.com/currency.indilabz.in/api/v1/usd/inr/12"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "currency-converter10.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://currency-converter10.p.rapidapi.com/currency.indilabz.in/api/v1/{is_from}/{to}/{amount}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "currency-converter10.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
